name: Mr. Postman (Enzo Mannaert)
description:
Game summary

This game was originally an idea me and some friends had for a gamejam but we ended up making something else, so I wanted to make it myself. "Mr. Postman" is all about keeping storage available inside your post office. Packages keep coming in but space is limited, so deliver everything as fast as possible. You get paid per package that you deliver that way you can afford to upgrade your post office and several other things that aid you to deliver packages. And if you get lost make sure to look at the bottom left corner and let the arrow guide you.

Controls
  • Press "W" and "S" or "UP and DOWN arrows to go forward and backwards
  • Press "A" and "D" or "LEFT and RIGHT arrows to steer left and right
  • Press "E" to pick up and deliver packages
Extra feature

If you do not like the music just change the radio station! Press "LEFT SHIFT" to cycle through 4 amazing radio stations.
